abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Structural Adjustment Loan
            Project supports the Government's structural adjustment
            program. The adjustment program will accelerate exports and
            increase domestic savings while creating the preconditions
            for a recovery of economic growth and employment. The major
            areas covered by the medium term program include : (i)
            measures to improve incentives to stimulate private savings
            and investment in export oriented activities; (ii) measures
            to increase public savings and the efficiency of the public
            sector investment program; (iii) measures to improve the
            public commercial banks' mobilization and allocation of
            resources; and (iv) measures to improve the productivity of
            the private agricultural sector.
